function createDispute(address marketContract, uint256 marketId, string calldata reason) external payable returns (uint256)
function voteOnDispute(uint256 disputeId, bool acceptDispute) external payable
function authorityResolveDispute(uint256 disputeId, bool acceptDispute, string calldata reason) external
function getMarketDispute(address marketContract, uint256 marketId) external view returns (uint256)

function getDisputeInfo(uint256 disputeId) external view returns (address marketContract, uint256 marketId, address disputer, string memory reason, uint256 disputeStake, uint8 status, uint8 outcome, uint256 totalAcceptStake, uint256 totalRejectStake, uint256 votingEndTime)
function getVoteInfo(uint256 disputeId, address voter) external view returns (bool hasVoted, bool vote, uint256 stake, bool claimed)
function calculatePotentialWinnings(uint256 disputeId, address voter) external view returns (uint256 potentialWinnings, bool isWinning)
event DisputeCreated(uint256 indexed disputeId, address indexed marketContract, uint256 indexed marketId, address disputer, string reason, uint256 stake)
event VoteCast(uint256 indexed disputeId, address indexed voter, bool vote, uint256 stake)
event DisputeResolved(uint256 indexed disputeId, uint8 outcome, string reason)
event StakeClaimed(uint256 indexed disputeId, address indexed claimer, uint256 amount, bool isWinner)
